name: swinfy-lms
description: A modern Learning Management System built with React, Django, and PostgreSQL

scripts.backend: source .venv/bin/activate && export PATH='/opt/homebrew/opt/postgresql@16/bin:$PATH' && cd backend && python manage.py runserver
scripts.shell: source .venv/bin/activate && export PATH='/opt/homebrew/opt/postgresql@16/bin:$PATH' && cd backend && python manage.py shell
scripts.migrate: source .venv/bin/activate && export PATH='/opt/homebrew/opt/postgresql@16/bin:$PATH' && cd backend && python manage.py migrate
scripts.makemigrations: source .venv/bin/activate && export PATH='/opt/homebrew/opt/postgresql@16/bin:$PATH' && cd backend && python manage.py makemigrations

author: Swinfy Team
